title: Riot really needs to fix their client.
body:
We all know the client is shit, we just put up with it, but after what i just had today, i can't even fathom how this makes sense.

So basically i AFK'd in a ranked game, this happened mostly because at my pick (second pick Red side) i DC'd after picking a champion, and this isn't due to internet issues, my entire laptop overheated.

So i assumed that i may as well let the laptop cool off properly before i turn it on, because i made the wrong assumption that there is no way i could be in game, but no the client couldn't even tell i was gone through the 7 other picks and the extra 30 seconds at the end.

I managed to log on to league as my team was about to lose, and the saddest thing for my team is, i only lost 13 LP, it's not like i even lost anything out of this.

I afk'd for all but maybe a minute at the end, and nothing happened.

GG riot, your client is trash.

replies.body: Sounds like you need an Alienware PC.{{champion:48}}
